name: Green Lantern
description: Eons before the Green Lantern Corps, the Guardians of the Universe created an android race of interstellar police—the Manhunters. When corrupted programming made them punish all life, the Manhunters were exiled. Now they’ve returned, seeking vengeance. You are Hal Jordan, the first human Green Lantern, armed with a power ring charged by your will. Green Lantern: Rise of the Manhunters features the likeness and voice talent of Ryan Reynolds.
